abstract: The home improvement chain announced that it was dropping plans to open 50 stores and would close 15 poorly performing locations.
snippet: The home improvement chain announced that it was dropping plans to open 50 stores and would close 15 poorly performing locations.
lead_paragraph: Home Depot, the nation’s largest home improvement chain, said Thursday in a statement that it was dropping plans to open 50 stores and would close 15 poorly performing locations, becoming the latest retail victim of the slowdown in consumer spending.

headline.main: Slower Consumer Spending Hits Home Depot
headline.print_headline: Slower Consumer Spending Hits Home Depot
